AccountId.description: The unique identifier of the account to which the data belongs.

AgeGroup.description: The age group of the audience targeted by the campaign.

Gender.description: The gender of the audience targeted by the campaign.

TimePeriod.description: The specific date and time period for the collected data.

AllConversions.description: Total number of all types of conversions.

AccountName.description: The name of the account to which the data belongs.

AccountNumber.description: The account number associated with the account.

CampaignName.description: The name of the campaign to which the data belongs.

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign to which the data belongs.

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group to which the data belongs.

AdGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the ad group to which the data belongs.

AdDistribution.description: The distribution network where the ad was displayed (search, display, etc.).

Impressions.description: The total number of times the ad was displayed to users.

Clicks.description: The total number of times the ad was clicked on.

Conversions.description: The total number of conversions generated by the ad.

Spend.description: The total amount spent on running the ad campaign.

Revenue.description: The total revenue generated by the ad campaign.

ExtendedCost.description: The total cost of running the ad campaign including all associated costs.

Assists.description: The number of times this ad appeared in a conversion path but was not the last click before the conversion.

Language.description: The language targeting setting for the campaign.

AccountStatus.description: The status of the account (active, paused, etc.).

CampaignStatus.description: The status of the campaign (active, paused, etc.).

AdGroupStatus.description: The status of the ad group (active, paused, etc.).

BaseCampaignId.description: The unique identifier of the base campaign to which the data belongs.

AllRevenue.description: Total revenue generated from all types of conversions.

ViewThroughConversions.description: The number of times users saw but did not interact with this ad and later converted.

Goal.description: The objective or goal set for the campaign.

GoalType.description: The type of goal set for the campaign (e.g., clicks, conversions).

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of times that your ad is shown at the top of the page, above the organic search results.

TopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of times that your ad is shown at the top of the search results.

ConversionsQualified.description: The total number of conversions that meet specified criteria.

AllConversionsQualified.description: Total number of all types of conversions that meet specified criteria.

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The number of view-through conversions that meet specified criteria.

ViewThroughRevenue.description: The revenue generated from view-through conversions.
